interface.name: SnmpMsgProcessingModel
interface.javadoc:
The message processing model interface. Any message processing model must implement this interface in order to be integrated in the engine framework. The model is called by the dispatcher when a call is received or when a call is sent.

This API is a Sun Microsystems internal API and is subject to change without notice.

1.5

This method is called when a call is to be sent to the network.
factory The pdu factory to use to encode and decode pdu.
The object that will handle every steps of the sending (mainly marshalling and security).

This method is called when a call is received from the network.
factory The pdu factory to use to encode and decode pdu.
The object that will handle every steps of the receiving (mainly unmarshalling and security).

This method is called when a response is received from the network.
factory The pdu factory to use to encode and decode pdu.
The object that will handle every steps of the receiving (mainly unmarshalling and security).

This method is called to instantiate a pdu according to the passed pdu type and parameters.
p The request parameters.
type The pdu type.
The pdu.

This method is called to encode a full scoped pdu that has not been encrypted. contextName, contextEngineID and data are known.
The specified parameters are defined in RFC 2572 (see also the {@link com.sun.jmx.snmp.SnmpV3Message} class). version The SNMP protocol version. msgID The SNMP message ID. msgMaxSize The max message size. msgFlags The message flags. msgSecurityModel The message security model. params The security parameters. contextEngineID The context engine ID. contextName The context name. data The encoded data. dataLength The encoded data length. outputBytes The buffer containing the encoded message. The encoded bytes number.

This method is called to encode a full scoped pdu that as been encrypted. contextName, contextEngineID and data are known.
The specified parameters are defined in RFC 2572 (see also the {@link com.sun.jmx.snmp.SnmpV3Message} class). version The SNMP protocol version. msgID The SNMP message ID. msgMaxSize The max message size. msgFlags The message flags. msgSecurityModel The message security model. params The security parameters. encryptedPdu The encrypted pdu. outputBytes The buffer containing the encoded message. The encoded bytes number.

This method returns a decoded scoped pdu. This method decodes only the contextEngineID, contextName and data. It is needed by the SnmpSecurityModel after decryption. pdu The encoded pdu. The partialy scoped pdu.

This method returns an encoded scoped pdu. This method encode only the contextEngineID, contextName and data. It is needed by the SnmpSecurityModel for decryption. pdu The pdu to encode. outputBytes The partialy scoped pdu. The encoded bytes number.

In order to change the behavior of the translator, set it.
translator The translator that will be used.

Returns the current translator.
The current translator.
